metas.name: Guardians of the Galaxy (2014)
metas.description: Given your enjoyment of high-octane, fun action like Thor: Ragnarok and Marvel, this film delivers a similar blend of humor, adventure, and a fantastic soundtrack. It's incredibly lighthearted and entertaining.

metas.name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse (2018)
metas.description: You've watched some sci-fi action and comedy, and this animated masterpiece offers a vibrant, funny, and visually stunning take on superheroics. It's incredibly creative and fun.

metas.name: Booksmart (2019)
metas.description: If you appreciate witty dialogue and lighthearted comedy, this coming-of-age story about two best friends on a quest for fun before graduation is a fantastic choice.

metas.name: Palm Springs (2020)
metas.description: This rom-com with a sci-fi twist is incredibly clever, funny, and surprisingly heartwarming. It offers a unique take on a familiar concept, perfect for a relaxed watch.

metas.name: Knives Out (2019)
metas.description: Since you're interested in mysteries with a comedic twist like Wake Up Dead Man, this film is a brilliant, witty, and engaging whodunit with a fantastic ensemble cast.

metas.name: Kick-Ass (2010)
metas.description: You enjoy action and comedy, and this film offers a unique, R-rated take on superheroes that's both violent and incredibly funny, with a punk-rock energy.

metas.name: Ferris Bueller's Day Off (1986)
metas.description: A timeless classic of lighthearted fun and rebellion. It's pure escapism and guaranteed to put a smile on your face, fitting the 'light, comfort, fun' criteria perfectly.

metas.name: Chef (2014)
metas.description: This is a wonderfully feel-good movie about passion, family, and food. It's incredibly charming, uplifting, and has a great soundtrack, making it perfect for relaxation.

metas.name: Knives Out (2019)
metas.description: Since you're interested in mysteries with a comedic twist like Wake Up Dead Man, this film is a brilliant, witty, and engaging whodunit with a fantastic ensemble cast.

metas.name: Hot Fuzz (2007)
metas.description: From the creators of Shaun of the Dead, this is a brilliant action-comedy that parodies buddy cop movies with sharp wit and surprising bursts of action. It's incredibly funny and well-crafted.

metas.name: Murder Mystery (2019)
metas.description: Given your interest in mystery and comedy, this film offers a lighthearted whodunit with Adam Sandler and Jennifer Aniston. It's a fun, easy watch perfect for relaxation.

metas.name: Midnight Run (1988)
metas.description: A classic buddy action-comedy. The chemistry between De Niro and Grodin is fantastic, and the chase sequences are fun and exciting, offering a great blend of action and laughs.
